name: Muk
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: Their food sources have decreased, and their numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds are being built to prevent their extinction.

abilities.name: Poison Sacs
abilities.effect: The Special Condition Poisoned is not removed when your opponent’s Pokémon evolve or devolve.

attacks.name: Toxic Secretion
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.
